title: x/build/env: enable softupdates for OpenBSD images
body:
We should evaluate enabling [soft updates](https://www.openbsd.org/faq/faq14.html#SoftUpdates) for the OpenBSD images, or even just mount the filesystem [async](http://man.openbsd.org/mount.8) entirely. Since the machines are ephemeral, there should be no issues about filesystem consistency.

/cc @bradfitz @4a6f656c
